name: Memories of Fireflies
description:
• Metroidvania world
  • get bosses' weapons
  • creative stage designs
  • various sceneries
  • original story
  • concise menu
  • skippable dialogues

Boss refights on the main menu, you can fight a boss as many times as you can after you've met it.

However there is no dash or double jump, I originally planned to include slide feature, but that trivializes some boss fights.

There are also shooter section, jet riding sections, gravity flip, and many other gimmicks.

You can probably find some original stage designs that you haven't seen elsewhere.

Note I tested this game with Xbox 360 joystick, but it seems to NOT work with Xbox One joystick.

You can turn off Voice if you want.
